title: Create launch metrics dashboard template
description: Design a markdown-based weekly metrics report template in deliverables/metrics/template.md. Sections: npm downloads (daily/weekly), GitHub stars/forks/issues, social mentions, channel attribution.

comments.text: Template already in deliverables/metrics/template.md with all required sections: npm downloads (daily/weekly/monthly), GitHub metrics (stars/forks/issues/watchers), social mentions (HN/Twitter/Reddit), channel attribution, KPI scorecard, and recommendations.
[lead-1] Metrics dashboard template complete with tracking scripts. Approved.
